main event: A white elongated object was observed falling down vertically at unbelievable speed in Concord, New Hampshire on March 31, 1954.
interesting points: The object was visible for 8-10 seconds before it suddenly disappeared without fading away., Witnesses described the object moving at unbelievable speed., There were no photographs or physical evidence supporting the sighting., The object was described as bright and elongated., The sighting was made by a civilian source.
